means: 阿斯彭（科罗拉多中西部的一座城市，位于落基山脉的萨沃奇岭。约在1879年由银矿勘探者建立，现为一流行的滑雪圣地。人口5， 049）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from dialect asp (in the same sense) + -en, forming anadjective later used as a noun (late 16th cent.)

encyclopedia.content: 概况 Aspen是索尼爱立信公司于2010年02月04日正式在其官方网站发布了该款产品，最终确定的名字为Aspen，Aspen 与Garmin Asus Nuvifone 10手机相同，索尼爱立信在国外正式发布了运行Windows Mobile 6.5.3系统的Windows Phone手机——Aspen，这也是继X1、X2之后的第三款配备QWERTY全键盘的WM手机，同时Aspen也沿袭了XPERIA的用户界面。在外形上采用了直板设计，与诺基亚E系列智能机相仿，该机配备了2.4英寸QVGA级别6万5千色的触控屏

entry.def: An aspen is a tall tree with leaves that move a lot in the wind.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several trees of the genus Populus having leaves on flattened stalks so that they flutter in the lightest wind

auth_sentence.content: Deep canyons and mountain streams cut across the aspen-forested landscape.
